Feature:
Product name: curly curlers with dual use curl
Heating core: PTC
Heating element: aluminum alloy
Speed setting: high, medium and low

product.description_full:
Feature: Product name: curly curlers with dual use curl Heating core: PTC Heating element: aluminum alloy Speed setting: high, medium and low Nominal voltage: 100-240 V Rated power: 50W Nominal frequency: 50 / 60Hz Product color: white silver Material: PET+ABS Product dimensions: 29cm / 11.4 in Packing: color box Dimensions of the color box: 32.5 * 9.5 * 6.2 cm Simple weight (gross): 0.55 kg Packing quantity: 1 PCS Package Include: 1 * Salon Straightener & Curling 1 * Storage Bag 1 * Comb 1 * Anti-scalding Gloves 1 * Beautiful Box * [60 Seconds Fast Heating] Our hair straightening brush only takes 60 seconds to reach the ideal temperature you set. After customer use test, we found it only takes 4-5 minutes to change hair style, and let your hair looks more natural and more shiny. At the same time, it saves your precious time, your cost of going to barber shop, home electricity fee.
 * [Simple & Fast] Ionic bristles reduce frizz and deliver incredible shine.The rounded design of the rotating barrel smooth hair without burning, or creasing.Harnessing the styling power of a round brush and blow dryer to produce smooth, shiny hair with volume and movement.
 * [Suitable for All Hair Types] Our straightener & curler brush has 3 temperatures, 302℉、356℉and 446℉, change the temperature of hair brush by ON/OFF button operation.It is suitable for any hair (hard, coarse hair; medium, curly hair; soft, damaged hair). Different hair, corresponding to different temperatures, to achieve the straight/curler hair effect you want.
 * [Make You Charm] Rotating Iron straightens and smoothes without crushing flattening or baking hair. Heated titanium rotating cylinder wrap your hair around the rotating barrel and you can achieve beautiful soft curls or bouncing beachy waves.
 * [Take It When You Travel] Straighten hair at home on your own easily at any angle with the 360-degree swivel power cord. In addition,the worldwide dual voltage compatible 110v-220v makes you can take it with you on your next vacation.
product.description_full_html:
Feature: Product name: curly curlers with dual use curl Heating core: PTC Heating element: aluminum alloy Speed setting: high, medium and low Nominal voltage: 100-240 V Rated power: 50W Nominal frequency: 50 / 60Hz Product color: white silver Material: PET+ABS Product dimensions: 29cm / 11.4 in Packing: color box Dimensions of the color box: 32.5 * 9.5 * 6.2 cm Simple weight (gross): 0.55 kg Packing quantity: 1 PCS Package Include: 1 * Salon Straightener & Curling 1 * Storage Bag 1 * Comb 1 * Anti-scalding Gloves 1 * Beautiful Box
  • [60 Seconds Fast Heating] Our hair straightening brush only takes 60 seconds to reach the ideal temperature you set. After customer use test, we found it only takes 4-5 minutes to change hair style, and let your hair looks more natural and more shiny. At the same time, it saves your precious time, your cost of going to barber shop, home electricity fee.
  • [Simple & Fast] Ionic bristles reduce frizz and deliver incredible shine.The rounded design of the rotating barrel smooth hair without burning, or creasing.Harnessing the styling power of a round brush and blow dryer to produce smooth, shiny hair with volume and movement.
  • [Suitable for All Hair Types] Our straightener & curler brush has 3 temperatures, 302℉、356℉and 446℉, change the temperature of hair brush by ON/OFF button operation.It is suitable for any hair (hard, coarse hair; medium, curly hair; soft, damaged hair). Different hair, corresponding to different temperatures, to achieve the straight/curler hair effect you want.
  • [Make You Charm] Rotating Iron straightens and smoothes without crushing flattening or baking hair. Heated titanium rotating cylinder wrap your hair around the rotating barrel and you can achieve beautiful soft curls or bouncing beachy waves.
  • [Take It When You Travel] Straighten hair at home on your own easily at any angle with the 360-degree swivel power cord. In addition,the worldwide dual voltage compatible 110v-220v makes you can take it with you on your next vacation.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
